small-screw.name: Small Screw
small-screw.description: A small metal screw dropped by a defeated mecha.
small-screw.description_shop: This item is loved by a certain robot and can be traded in for a moderate amount of Zenny.

large-screw.name: Large Screw
large-screw.description: A large metal screw dropped by a defeated master.
large-screw.description_shop: This item is loved by a certain robot and can be traded in for a generous amount of Zenny.

energy-pellet.name: Energy Pellet
energy-pellet.description: A small health pellet that restores up to {RECOVERY}% life energy to one robot on the user's side of the field.

energy-capsule.name: Energy Capsule
energy-capsule.description: A large health capsule that restores up to {RECOVERY}% life energy to one robot on the user's side of the field.

weapon-pellet.name: Weapon Pellet
weapon-pellet.description: A small ammo pellet that restores up to {RECOVERY}% weapon energy to one robot on the user's side of the field.

weapon-capsule.name: Weapon Capsule
weapon-capsule.description: A large ammo capsule that restores up to {RECOVERY}% weapon energy to one robot on the user's side of the field.

attack-pellet.name: Attack Pellet
attack-pellet.description: A small weapon pellet that sharply raises the attack stat of one robot on the user's side of the field.

attack-capsule.name: Attack Capsule
attack-capsule.description: A large weapon capsule that drastically raises the attack stat of one robot on the user's side of the field.

defense-pellet.name: Defense Pellet
defense-pellet.description: A small shield pellet that sharply raises the defense stat of one robot on the user's side of the field.

defense-capsule.name: Defense Capsule
defense-capsule.description: A large shield capsule that drastically raises the defense stat of one robot on the user's side of the field.

speed-pellet.name: Speed Pellet
speed-pellet.description: A small mobility pellet that sharply raises the speed stat of one robot on the user's side of the field.

speed-capsule.name: Speed Capsule
speed-capsule.description: A large mobility capsule that drastically raises the speed stat of one robot on the user's side of the field.

super-pellet.name: Super Pellet
super-pellet.description: A small multi-color pellet that raises the attack, defense, and speed stats of one robot on the user's side of the field.

super-capsule.name: Super Capsule
super-capsule.description: A large multi-color capsule that sharply raises the attack, defense, and speed stats of one robot on the user's side of the field.

energy-tank.name: Energy Tank
energy-tank.description: A large health tank that restores 100% life energy to one robot on the user's side of the field.

extra-life.name: Extra Life
extra-life.description: A backup program that revives one disabled robot on the user's side of the field with {RECOVERY}% life and weapon energy.

weapon-tank.name: Weapon Tank
weapon-tank.description: A large ammo tank that restores 100% weapon energy to one robot on the user's side of the field.

yashichi.name: Yashichi
yashichi.description: A strange pinwheel-shaped generator that can restore {RECOVERY}% life and weapon energy to one robot on the user's side of the field, but only if they're currently on the bench.

cutter-shard.name: Cutter Shard
cutter-shard.description: A mysterious elemental shard that radiates with the Cutter type energy of a defeated support mecha.  Collect four of these items to generate a new core!

cutter-core.name: Cutter Core
cutter-core.description: A mysterious elemental core that radiates with the Cutter type energy of a defeated robot master.
cutter-core.description_hold: When held, this item grants compatibility with any Cutter type ability as well as power and weapon energy bonuses similar to that of an internal core.

impact-core.description_hold: When held, this item grants compatibility with any Impact type ability as well as power and weapon energy bonuses similar to that of an internal core.

shield-core.description_hold: When held, this item grants compatibility with any Shield type ability as well as power and weapon energy bonuses similar to that of an internal core.

laser-shard.name: Laser Shard
laser-shard.description: A mysterious elemental shard that radiates with the Laser type energy of a defeated support mecha.  Collect four of these items to generate a new core!

laser-core.name: Laser Core
laser-core.description: A mysterious elemental core that radiates with the Laser type energy of a defeated robot master.
laser-core.description_hold: When held, this item grants compatibility with any Laser type ability as well as power and weapon energy bonuses similar to that of an internal core.

copy-shard.name: Copy Shard
copy-shard.description: A mysterious elemental shard that radiates with the Copy type energy of a defeated support mecha.  Collect four of these items to generate a new core!

copy-core.name: Copy Core
copy-core.description: A mysterious elemental core that radiates with the Copy type energy of a defeated robot master.

none-shard.name: Neutral Shard
none-shard.description: A mysterious elemental shard that radiates with the Neutral type energy of a defeated support mecha.  Collect four of these items to generate a new core!

none-core.name: Neutral Core
none-core.description: A mysterious elemental core that radiates with the Neutral type energy of a defeated robot master.

energy-upgrade.name: Energy Upgrade
energy-upgrade.description: A mysterious drive containing some kind of energy upgrade program.  When held by a robot master, this item doubles the user's maximum life energy in battle.

weapon-upgrade.name: Weapon Upgrade
weapon-upgrade.description: A mysterious drive containing some kind of weapon upgrade program.  When held by a robot master, this item doubles the user's maximum weapon energy in battle.

attack-booster.name: Attack Booster
attack-booster.description: A mysterious disc containing some kind of attack booster program.  When held by a robot master, this item increases the user's attack stat by one stage at end of each turn in battle.

defense-booster.name: Defense Booster
defense-booster.description: A mysterious disc containing some kind of defense booster program.  When held by a robot master, this item increases the user's defense stat by one stage at the end of each turn in battle.

speed-booster.name: Speed Booster
speed-booster.description: A mysterious disc containing some kind of speed booster program.  When held by a robot master, this item increases the user's speed stat by one stage at the end of each turn in battle.

field-booster.name: Field Booster
field-booster.description: A mysterious disc containing some kind of elemental booster program.  When held by a robot master, this item increases the field multiplier matching the user's core type by up to {RECOVERY2}% at end of each turn in battle.

attack-diverter.name: Attack Diverter
attack-diverter.description: A mysterious chip containing some kind of stat rerouting algorithm. When held by a robot master, this item diverts two thirds of the user's attack points into other stats while they're in battle.

defense-diverter.name: Defense Diverter
defense-diverter.description: A mysterious chip containing some kind of stat rerouting algorithm. When held by a robot master, this item diverts two thirds of the user's defense points into other stats while they're in battle.

speed-diverter.name: Speed Diverter
speed-diverter.description: A mysterious chip containing some kind of stat rerouting algorithm. When held by a robot master, this item diverts two thirds of the user's speed points into other stats while they're in battle.

target-module.name: Target Module
target-module.description: A mysterious chip that improves the targeting capabilities of the holder.  When held by a robot master, this item allows abilities that typically only reach the front row to target benched robots as well.

charge-module.name: Charge Module
charge-module.description: A mysterious chip that improves the charging capabilities of the holder.  When held by a robot master, this item allows the user to skip the charging phase of abilities that typically require two turns to execute.

guard-module.name: Guard Module
guard-module.description: A mysterious chip that protects the holder's stats in battle.  When held by a robot master, this item makes any attempted stat changes to its owner have no effect.

reverse-module.name: Reverse Module
reverse-module.description: A mysterious chip that regulates the holder's stats in battle.  When held by a robot master, this item makes any stat changes to its owner have an opposite effect.

xtreme-module.name: Xtreme Module
xtreme-module.description: A mysterious chip that deregulates the holder's stats in battle.  When held by a robot master, this item makes any stat changes to its owner have an extreme effect.

growth-module.name: Growth Module
growth-module.description: A mysterious chip that improves the holder's experiences in battle.  When held by a robot master, this item doubles experience points and bonus stats earned upon defeating a target.

fortune-module.name: Fortune Module
fortune-module.description: A mysterious chip that improves the holder's luck in battle.  When held by a robot master, this item greatly increases the amount of zenny earned from missions and causes enemies to drop items more frequently.

battery-circuit.name: Battery Circuit
battery-circuit.description: A mysterious battery-like circuit that grants the holder an elemental affinity to Electric type damage in exchange for a weakness to Nature type damage.

sponge-circuit.name: Sponge Circuit
sponge-circuit.description: A mysterious sponge-like circuit that grants the holder an elemental affinity to Water type damage in exchange for a weakness to Electric type damage.

forge-circuit.name: Forge Circuit
forge-circuit.description: A mysterious forge-like circuit that grants the holder an elemental affinity to Flame type damage in exchange for a weakness to Water type damage.

sapling-circuit.name: Sapling Circuit
sapling-circuit.description: A mysterious sapling-like circuit that grants the holder an elemental affinity to Nature type damage in exchange for a weakness to Flame type damage.

chrono-circuit.name: Chrono Circuit
chrono-circuit.description: A mysterious hourglass-themed circuit that grants the holder an elemental affinity to Time type damage in exchange for a weakness to Space type damage.

cosmo-circuit.name: Cosmo Circuit
cosmo-circuit.description: A mysterious celestial-themed circuit that grants the holder an elemental affinity to Space type damage in exchange for a weakness to Time type damage.

light-program.name: Light Program
light-program.description: A helpful program developed by Dr. Light for use in the prototype, this item allows the doctors to share their unlocked abilities and items with one another.  This program also unlocks the "Player Battles" bonus chapter in the post-game.

wily-program.name: Wily Program
wily-program.description: An essential program developed by Dr. Wily for use in the prototype, this item allows the doctors to transfer unlocked robot masters between each other.  This program also unlocks the "Challenge Mode" bonus chapter in the post-game.

cossack-program.name: Cossack Program
cossack-program.description: An intriguing program developed by Dr. Cossack for use in the prototype, this item allows the doctors to scan for and locate alien energy in the prototype.  This program also unlocks the "Star Fields" bonus chapter in the post-game.

auto-link.name: Auto Link
auto-link.description: A communication link created by Dr. Light for use inside the prototype, this item grants the doctors contact with Auto and allows access to his shop.

reggae-link.name: Reggae Link
reggae-link.description: A communication link created by Dr. Wily for use inside the prototype, this item grants the doctors contact with Reggae and allows access to its shop.

kalinka-link.name: Kalinka Link
kalinka-link.description: A communication link created by Dr. Cossack for use inside the prototype, this item grants the doctors contact with Kalinka and allows access to her shop.

item-codes.name: Item Codes
item-codes.description: A rare piece of source code acquired by Auto during his journey, these files detail the mechanics of consumable items in the prototype and grant access to the Item Shop.

equip-codes.name: Equip Codes
equip-codes.description: A rare piece of source code acquired by Auto during his journey, these files detail the mechanics of holdable items in the prototype and grant access to the Parts Shop.

ability-codes.name: Ability Codes
ability-codes.description: A rare piece of source code acquired by Reggae during its journey, these files detail the mechanics of support abilities in the prototype and grant access to the Ability Shop.

weapon-codes.name: Weapon Codes
weapon-codes.description: A rare piece of source code acquired by Reggae during its journey, these files detail the mechanics of special weapons in the prototype and grant access to the Weapon Shop.

master-codes.name: Master Codes
master-codes.description: A rare piece of source code acquired by Kalinka during her journey, these files detail the construction of robot masters in the prototype and grant access to the Robot Shop.

dress-codes.name: Dress Codes
dress-codes.description: A rare piece of source code acquired by Kalinka during her journey, these files detail the creation of alternate outfits in the prototype and grant access to the Alt Shop.

omega-seed.name: Omega Seed
omega-seed.description: A small seed-like object of unknown origin, this item appears to reveal and grant control over the hidden Omega influences in the prototype.  It's unknown how one comes to possess such an item.

field-star.name: Field Star
field-star.description: A mysterious elemental star that radiates with the energy of a distant planet. These stars appear to form on elemental battle fields and come in a variety of different types. Collecting stars increases one's Starforce and makes their robots grow stronger!

fusion-star.name: Fusion Star
fusion-star.description: A mysterious elemental star that radiates with the energy of distant planets. These stars appear to form when two different battle fields fuse together and come in a variety of different types. Collecting stars increases one's Starforce and makes their robots grow stronger!
